topic_or_construct: motivations to avoid exposure to unpleasant stimuli
justification: The article notes that "two studies in psychiatric samples fit this precision within the context of an approach-avoidance conflict task to identify differences in motivations to avoid exposure to unpleasant stimuli" – indicating the task was used as the measurement instrument for that motivational construct.

It further states the same studies were used "to identify continuous relationships between this precision and self-reported anxiety and decision uncertainty," showing the approach-avoidance conflict task was the tool employed to assess decision uncertainty.
